name: Hardest "The Pajama Game" Trivia Quiz | Musicals | 15 Questions

questions.text: What year was "The Pajama Game" first on Broadway?
The first song in the show is "Pajama Game". Complete the lyrics from this song. "I can hardly wait to wake and get to work at __________"
questions.explanation:
eight.

	This song is sung by Hines. Hines was originally played by Eddie Foy, Jr.

questions.text: Who did John Raitt play in the Original Broadway Cast?
questions.explanation:
Sid.

	John Raitt also played Billy Bigalow in "Carousel."

questions.text: The next song is "Racing With the Clock." Complete the lyrics. "And the second hand doesn't understand, that your back may break and your fingers __________."
questions.explanation:
ache.

	Hines is a "time saving man" and wants the girls to get as much done as possible so they "can't waste time".

questions.text: The next song is "A New Town is a Blue Town". Complete the lyrics: "You don't take long to find that you're in a _____ town
questions.explanation:
cold.

	"A New Town is a Blue Town" is sung by Sid.

questions.text: Who is Babe in love with?
questions.explanation:
Sid.

	Babe was played by Janis Page.

questions.text: In the song "I'll Never be Jealous Again" what does Hines say he'd do if he comes home and finds Gladys giving a sailor a "very affectionate squeeze"?
questions.explanation:
I would trust her.

	"I would trust her, by God I swear I would trust her. I'll never be jealous, no I'll never never never never never never never never be jealous again."

questions.text: Who sings the duet part with Sid in "Hey There"?
questions.explanation:
Sid.

	Sid is recording his voice the first time he sings the song. Then he sings it again, and he's singing it with himself.

questions.text: Complete the lyrics from "Her Is": "Her is a kinda doll what drives a fellow ______, isn't her? Her is."
questions.explanation:
bats.

	The music and lyrics for "The Pajama Game" were written by Jerry Ross and Richard Alder.

Babe and Sid.

	Babe and Sid sing this song when they try to talk small talk with each other but all they want to do is make out.

questions.text: Complete the lyrics from "Small Talk". "I've gotta buy me a __________ dress, the one that I have is such a mess."
questions.explanation:
dressy.

	This line was sung by Babe.

questions.text: Compete the lyrics from "There Once Was a Man" "There once was a woman who loved a man, he was the one she drank the _____________ for, they say that no body could love as much as she...'cept meeeeeee, I love you more."
questions.explanation:
poison.

	This song sounds like a western number when it's song. Sid and Babe are telling each other how much they love one another.

questions.text: My favorite song in the show is "Think of the Time I Save" Compete the lyrics from this song. "When I go to sleep I don't __________."
questions.explanation:
undress.

	The best verse in this song is "At breakfast time, I grab a bowl and in the bowl I drop an egg, and add some juice. A poor excuse for what I crave. And then I'll add some oatmeal too, and it comes out tasting just like goo. But think of the time I save."

questions.text: Complete the lyrics from "Hernando's Hideaway". "I know a dark _____________ place."
questions.explanation:
secluded.

	This scene is awesome to watch. The lights are all off and they use flashlights to shine the faces when they're singing.

questions.text: How much of a raise do the workers ask for?
questions.explanation:
7.5 cents

	"7.5 cents doesn't mean a lot, but give it to me every hour, 40 hours every week and that's enough for me to be living like a king."
